ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.model
Class ServerClient

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w13t11.FoodBook.model.ServerClient

public class ServerClient
extends java.lang.Object

Communicates with the server to perform searches, upload recipes and upload photos to recipes. Implements the singleton design pattern. Code largely based on: ESDemo with HTTP Client and GSON LICENSE: CC0 http://creativecommons.org/choose/zero/ To the extent possible under law, Abram Hindle and Chenlei Zhang has waived all copyright and related or neighboring rights to this work. This work is published from: Canada. getThreadSafeClient() method cribbed from http://tech.chitgoks.com/2011/05/05/fixing-the-invalid-use-of-singleclientconnmanager-connection-still-allocated-problem/ (last accessed March 10, 2013)

Author:
Abram Hindle, Chenlei Zhang, Marko Babic

uploadRecipe

public ServerClient.ReturnCode uploadRecipe(Recipe recipe)
                                     throws java.lang.IllegalStateException,
                                            java.io.IOException
Uploads the given recipe to the server.

Parameters:
recipe - The recipe to be uploaded. ReturnCode.ERROR if anything goes wrong, ReturnCode.ALREADY_EXISTS if a recipe by that name already exists on the server (this will eventually be modified to check against URI instead of Recipe title), ReturnCode.SUCCESS if the recipe was successfully uploaded, or ReturnCode.BUSY if the network is not responding or the operation is taking too long.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException
java.io.IOException

searchByKeywords

public ServerClient.ReturnCode searchByKeywords(java.lang.String str)
                                         throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                                java.io.IOException
Performs a search of online recipes by keywords.

Parameters:
str - The string of keywords we wish to search by.
Returns:
ReturnCode.ERROR if anything goes wrong, ReturnCode.NO_RESULTS if the search returned no results, ReturnCode.SUCCESS if the search was successful, in which case the results are written to the database and the observing views are notified, ReturnCode.BUSY if the server was busy or the operation took longer than TIME_PERIOD seconds.
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException

searchByIngredients

public ServerClient.ReturnCode searchByIngredients(java.util.ArrayList<Ingredient> ingredients)
Query the server for Recipes which contains at subset of the given ingredients list.

Parameters:
ingredients - The list of ingredients by which to search.
Returns:
ReturnCode.ERROR if anything goes wrong, ReturnCode.NO_RESULTS if the search returned no results, ReturnCode.SUCCESS if the search was successful, in which case the results are written to the database and the observing views are notified, ReturnCode.BUSY if the server was busy or the operation took longer than TIME_PERIOD seconds.

uploadPhotoToRecipe

public ServerClient.ReturnCode uploadPhotoToRecipe(Photo photo,
                                                   long uri)
Upload the given Photo to the appropriate Recipe.

Parameters:
(Photo) - photo The photo to be added to the server-side version of the Recipe.
(long) - uri The uri of the Recipe to be updated.
Returns:
NOT_FOUND if the Recipe cannot be found on the server, ERROR on any other error occurred while attempting to upload, SUCCESS on successful upload.
